title: Bug 120315: Display property set to 'none' not taking effect in new PDF emitter
description: The display property of an item is not taking effect in the new PDF emitter when set to 'none'
OB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, the item is not hidden and still visible in the generated PDF document.
EB: The display property should hide the item when set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, ensuring that it is not visible in the generated PDF document.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label to the PDF document.
2. Open the 'properties' view for the label.
3. In the 'properties' view, set the 'sectionDisplay' property to 'none'.
4. Generate the PDF document and verify that the label is not visible.
